Chen.name: Flying Kick
Chen.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage.

Chen.name: Keg Smash
Chen.description: Smash your keg, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

Chen.name: Breath of Fire
Chen.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

Chen.name: Wandering Keg
Chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
Chen.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

Chen.name: Fortifying Brew
Chen.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after he stops drinking.

1.name: Accumulating Flame
1.description: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 25 Armor for 1 second per Hero Ignited, reducing damage taken by 25%.

1.name: Elusive Brawler
1.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Grounding Brew
1.description: Fortifying Brew grants 30 Spell Armor while drinking, reduces Ability Damage taken by 30%.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Keg Toss
4.description: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 3, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

4.name: Ring of Fire
4.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Bolder Flavor
7.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318. Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Purifying Brew
7.description: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 45 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

13.name: Withering Flames
13.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Ability Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Another Round
16.description: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Enough to Share
16.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+4% per level) per second.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities. Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable.  Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.  Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

20.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
20.description: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 25% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.
